My Hero Academia Master List

summary: Out of the Blue (G, One-shot, Todoroki/GenderNeutral!Reader)
title: Out of the Blue (G, One-shot, Todoroki/GenderNeutral!Reader)
body:
Based on this prompt by @givethispromptatry.



“What don’t you understand about this?”

“Everything.

“Be more specific.”

“I honestly can’t,” You breathed, your hand coming up to rub your forehead in an attempt to stall for time.

Today was definitely not going the way you expected. It was supposed to be an easy day, with regular classes in the morning, and lecture after lunch. Hero training had been cancelled for the day due to a last-minute absence of All Might, so really you were supposed to be on your way back to your dorm by now.

Not standing in the small recreational area behind the main building, under the cover of trees to create a private setting. Definitely not in this intimate area with Todoroki Shouto of all people. Compounded on that, you absolutely weren’t supposed to be standing in this intimate area with Todoroki Shouto after he just—

“It’s a simple answer. Will you go out with me, or not?”

Todoroki’s hands were tucked into the pockets of his uniform, but it was easy to see that they were balled into fists. He was obviously uneasy about this conversation, and you supposed your lack of an answer was making it even more difficult.

The two of you weren’t really anything beyond acquaintances, so the fact that he had any feelings for you beyond that was shocking. He wasn’t unattractive—the exact opposite, honestly—but it wasn’t something you had really put thought in to. Maybe it’s because you’ve been so single-minded on school, or… just oblivious to that sort of thing.

Running your hand down your face and letting it fall to your side, you finally grasped a response, “Why? Todoroki, we hardly know each other.”

“I know enough that I’d like to pursue you,” Todoroki’s voice left no room for objection on that front, and you let out a long sigh, once more to stall for time. Todoroki shifted from one foot to the other before continuing, “If you aren’t interested, I won’t be upset, just say no.”

“I-It’s not that I’m not interested,” You argued quickly, your shoulders tightening into a hard line, “This is just really out of the blue.”

“Well, it’s already been said, so if you have an answer—”

“The answer is yes, of course,” You interrupted him with a step forward, and your hand reached out toward him. In response, he pulled his right hand out of its pocket and grasped your fingers. His hand was smooth, and you vaguely realized that it was the hand belonging to his colder side. After a moment of silent hand-holding, you spoke.

“But don’t think you’re getting out of explaining yourself, Todoroki.”

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: As the Dust Settles
description:
by weirdsisters99

After All for One is defeated by All Might the world is holding its breath, wanting to know what is in store for themselves and the generations to come. In the midst of this uncertainty, Nedzu calls upon an old friend from America to help UA’s students recover from this event. In comes Hana Atten, one of America’s pro heroes who mysteriously left UA and Japan over 17 years ago armed with her psychology degree. She’s going to force UA to get the help it needs whether they want her help or not. However, as she digs deeper into the minds of the students at UA, she discovers something even darker than she expected. With more and more evidence of child soldiers and someone erasing and creating memories, Ms. Atten has to ask herself:

What is real and what isn’t?

(The summary sucks, but we swear this is a good story guys)

Words: 1127, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Multi
  • Characters: Original Female Character(s), Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shouto, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Shimura Nana, Toga Himiko, Sako Atsuhiro | Mr. Compress, Dabi (My Hero Academia), Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Sensei | All For One, Chisaki Kai | Overhaul
  • Relationships: Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Midoriya Inko/Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Shinsou Hitoshi/Original Character(s), Dabi/Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Tokoyami Fumikage/Shouji Mezou/Asui Tsuyu/Uraraka Ochako, Shouji Mezou/Tokoyami Fumikage, Asui Tsuyu/Tokoyami Fumikage, Asui Tsuyu/Uraraka Ochako, Ashido Mina/Kaminari Denki, Jirou Kyouka/Yaoyorozu Momo, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead/Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic, Kendou Itsuka/Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou
  • Additional Tags: Parental Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Father-Daughter Relationship(eventually), All Might has a kid, he just doesn’t know it, Really the man is hopeless, Divorce, Therapy, SO MUCH THERAPY, We made UA get a therapist, the kids aren’t alright, Adorable Midoriya Izuku, Smitten Todoroki, Implied/Referenced Brainwashing, Protective Shinsou Hitoshi, Shinsou Hitoshi Replaces Mineta Minoru, Mineta Minoru is Expelled from U.A. High School, Aoyama is a stalker and also gets expelled, Autistic Bakugou Katsuki, Bakugou Katsuki is Bad at Feelings, Bakugou Katsuki is a Dork, Bakugou Katsuki & Midoriya Izuku Friendship, Suicidal Thoughts, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Child Soldiers, Big Brother Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Dabi is a Todoroki, Half-Siblings, Villains to Heroes, Sort Of, Midoriya Izuku Needs A Hug, Everyone Needs A Hug, Class 1-A as Family (My Hero Academia), Protective Class 1-A (My Hero Academia), Todoroki Shouto & Yaoyorozu Momo Friendship, Creepy Toga Himiko, Chisaki Kai and Shimura Tenko are siblings, Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Mind Manipulation, Autistic Original Character

trail.content_raw:
by weirdsisters99

After All for One is defeated by All Might the world is holding its breath, wanting to know what is in store for themselves and the generations to come. In the midst of this uncertainty, Nedzu calls upon an old friend from America to help UA’s students recover from this event. In comes Hana Atten, one of America’s pro heroes who mysteriously left UA and Japan over 17 years ago armed with her psychology degree. She’s going to force UA to get the help it needs whether they want her help or not. However, as she digs deeper into the minds of the students at UA, she discovers something even darker than she expected. With more and more evidence of child soldiers and someone erasing and creating memories, Ms. Atten has to ask herself:

What is real and what isn’t?

(The summary sucks, but we swear this is a good story guys)

by AthaliaSlytherin

Ever since Kamino ward Bakugou has been having nightmares, and they’re getting worse. Kirishima feels bad about leaving his best friend to deal with it alone, but he isn’t sure how to help.

title: Franchise Films Are Getting Old
description:
by writer_zo

Katsuki and Kirishima are just colleagues if you ask the former, and just friends if you ask the latter. When an upcoming movie trailer reveals the existence of a legend about the two of them that implies some kind of karmic, soulmate-y connection, it doesn’t take long for Katsuki and the rest of 1A to lose any remaining scraps of sanity they had.

summary: The Strange Circumstances of the Man with the Mermaid Quirk - Chapter 1 - mezzosesu - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My...
title: The Strange Circumstances of the Man with the Mermaid Quirk - Chapter 1 - mezzosesu - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/?
Fandom: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Iida Tenya/Midoriya Izuku, Iida Tenya/Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto
Characters: Iida Tenya, Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shouto
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Mermaids, Mermaid!Todoroki, Inspired by Merman in my Tub manga, Established Iida Tenya/Midoriya Izuku, MerMay 2019, Characters Are Pro Heroes (My Hero Academia), Slice of Life
Summary:

Normally, it’s only natural to be concerned when your boyfriend is hiding strange naked men in your bathroom.

However, this isn’t normal by any means, particularly because this strange man in their bathtub with two-toned hair and no shirt also has a tail. And not just like his high school classmate’s tail, but a real, in the flesh, mermaid tail.
